SELECT COUNT(NO) AS CNT
FROM MEMBER

SELECT M.NO AS "NO", P.GET_POINT, P.EOE, P.SOURCE, P.CHANGES, TO_CHAR(P.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM POINT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE M.NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY M.NO, P.GET_POINT, P.EOE, P.SOURCE, P.CHANGES, P.ENROLL_DATE ORDER BY P.ENROLL_DATE DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT M.NO, M.NICK, MT.TITLE AS TITLE_NAME, I.TITLE AS ICON_NAME, M.EMAIL, M.POINT, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS ENROLL_DATE, M.DEL_YN FROM MEMBER M JOIN ICON I ON M.ICON_NO = I.NO JOIN MEMBER_TITLE MT ON M.MEMBER_TITLE_NO = MT.NO GROUP BY M.NO, M.NICK, MT.TITLE, I.TITLE, M.EMAIL, M.POINT, M.ENROLL_DATE, M.DEL_YN ORDER BY M.ENROLL_DATE DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT MAX(NO) AS MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ICON ( MEMBER_NO, ICON_NO ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, 1 )
